jobInfo.address: 上海浦东新区海东大楼1104

brandComInfo.introduce:
夏智是一家总部位于中国的云计算软件公司。它协助客户在数字时代打造新的商业模式、运营模式和技术模式。通过专业独到的咨询式服务，我们致力于帮助客户实现大规模数字化，迎接复杂挑战，加速规模转型，快速利用最新技术带来的巨大商业机遇。

XIAZHI is a cloud computing software company headquartered in China. It assists customers in creating new business models, operating models and technical models in the digital age. Through professional and unique consulting services, we are committed to helping customers achieve large-scale digitalization, meet complex challenges, accelerate scale transformation, and quickly utilize the huge business opportunities brought by the latest technology.

夏智提高客户满意度，降低成本，增加客户终身价值。使企业能够快速构建和开发应用程序，以满足客户和员工的需求，并在全球范围内推动数字化转型。

XIAZHI has enabled higher customer satisfaction, lower costs, and increased customer lifetime value. allows enterprises to quickly build and evolve apps to meet their customer and employee needs and drive digital transformation on a global scale.
